template.name: index-doc
template.value: <!doctype html> <html> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>Hello World</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css"> <!--styles:css--> <!--endinject--> <!--vendor:js--> <!--endinject--> </head> <body> $END$ <script src="app.js"></script> <!--app:js--> <!--endinject--> </body> </html>
template.description: blank starter to remember position of html parts

template.name: .substr
template.value: //str.substr(start, length) 'hello'.substr(1, 2); // = 'el' 'hello'.substr(1); // = 'ello' :: x to end 'hello'.substr(-3); // = 'llo' :: x from end 'hello'.substr(0, 4); // 'hell' :: x from beginning
